name: Tanktroid
description:
This is a short prototype of a game that I am planning.  

Arrow keys to move and aim, "Z" to jump, and "X" to shoot.  Switch between different weapons by clicking their icons.  Hold "P" to pause and change the difficulty level.  Hold "V" to cheat.  Red/Green circles auto-save, but "S" will manually save the game.  Fading away comepletely will reload the game, but pressing "L" will manually reload the game from the latest save point.   

-Scrolling is still buggy, so make sure that auto-scroll is selected-

Please comment if you have any thoughts about the game.
